item.description:
Located in downtown Middletown, Fiore II Restaurant offers inspired Italian dishes in a European-style eatery. A local favorite, Fiore II consistently impresses with quality ingredients, great service and a comfortable atmosphere.

With the feel of an Italian trattoria, our friendly staff strives to offer excellent food and attentive service. With signature dishes like Veal Fiore and classic standards like linguini with clam sauce, our talented chef creates memorable meals that are sure to impress.http://www.fioremiddletown.com/dinner.fiore.pdf....Come and enjoy a fun night !!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: a warm welcome by chuck 860-729-4504 my email chuckles39@comcast.net

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: FIRE UP YOUR TASTEBUDS FOR FIORE 2 RESTAURANT DEC 3 7PM
